title: Waste Water Disposal Infrastructure for Chilaw Town, Puttalam Town and Waste Water Disposal System for Maharagama, Boralesgamuwa Areas
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to proceed with the work relating to the award of contract for the above as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
